text: Egha Josepɨn aveghbuaba a ko ikiavɨra ikia, uarira uariv gɨa ghaze, “Bar guizbangɨra, e uan aveghbuam pazava a gamigha egha osɨmtɨzir kam iti. E an gari an en diava arava uabɨn akurvaghasa en gari, ezɨ e an akam baraghizir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn osɨmtɨzir datɨrɨghɨn e batozir kam, en arazir kurar kam ikara.”
